```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

#### a. read in the CalEnviroScreen data 
```{r}
ces <- read_csv(here("data","ces3demographics.csv")) %>% clean_names()
```



```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y=ces_3_0_score)) + 
         geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "% White", y = "CalEnviroScreen pollution burden score") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "darkorchid4", high = "magenta") +
  theme_minimal()
```
